item.title: Readings shared December 3, 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
The readings shared in Bluesky on 3 December 2024 are

  • Readings shared December 2, 2024. #ITP #LeanLang #Math #Calculemus #CategoryTheory #Math #Racket #FunctionalProgramming
  • Lean: First steps (17 - Using our own lemma). ~ Tariq Rashid. #ITP #Lean4 #Math
  • All your base are belong to Us (Sort polymorphism for proof assistants). ~ Josselin Poiret, Gaëtan Gilbert, Kenji Maillard, Pierre-Marie Pédrot, Matthieu Sozeau, Nicolas Tabareau, Éric Tanter. #ITP #CoqLang #Rocq
  • Mechanised safety verification for a distributed autonomous railway control system. ~ Robert Sachtleben, Anne Haxthausen, Jan Peleska. #ITP #IsabelleHOL
  • The mathematician who—incidentally—helped mathematicians to stop worrying and love the computer. ~ Keith Devlin. #Math
  • ChatGPT turns two: how the AI chatbot has changed scientists’ lives (How many researchers are using the AI tool? Nature gathers data and talks to members of the academic community). ~ Mariana Lenharo. #LLMs #ChatGPT

item.title: Readings shared November 7, 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
The readings shared in Mastodon on 7 November 2024 are

  • Unification in matching logic — revisited. ~ Ádám Kurucz, Péter Bereczky, Dániel Horpácsi. #ITP #Coq
  • Grupos en Lean. ~ Luis Turcio. #ITP #Lean4 #Math
  • The Haskell Unfolder Episode 35: Distributive and representable functors. ~ Edsko de Vries, Andres Löh. #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming
  • What can we mean? (on practices, norms and pluralisms). ~ Greg Restall. #ITP #Agda #Lean #Logic #Math
  • Learning rules explaining interactive theorem proving tactic prediction. ~ Liao Zhang, David M. Cerna, Cezary Kaliszyk. #ILP #ITP #Coq
  • Next-token prediction task assumes optimal data ordering for LLM training in proof generation. ~ Chenyang An et als. #LLMs #ITP #LeanProver
  • ChatGPT as tutor? A case study on competitive programming. ~ Juuso Rytilahti, Erno Lokkila. #ChatGPT #AI #Programming #Education

item.title: Readings shared October 15, 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
The readings shared in Mastodon on 15 October 2024 are

  • Readings shared October 13, 2024. #AI #CategoryTheory #Coq #Education #FunctionalProgramming #Haskell #ITP #ITP
  • On using GeoGebra and ChatGPT for geometric discovery. ~ Francisco Botana, Tomás Recio, María Pilar Vélez. #GeoGebra #ChatGPT #Math #AI
  • Lean: First steps (12 - Odd & Even ). ~ Tariq Rashid #ITP #Lean4 #Math
  • Tutorial videos for the course "Lean: First Steps". ~ Tariq Rashid. #ITP #Lean4 #Math
  • The handshaking lemma. ~ Christoph Spiegel. #ITP #LeanProver #Lean4 #Math
  • Water sort in Haskell. ~ Nicolas Audinet de Pieuchon. #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming
  • The power of Prolog. ~ Markus Triska. #Prolog #LogicProgramming
  • Programación lógica con restricciones. #Prolog #LogicProgramming
  • Emacs para ciencias del dato. #Emacs #OrgMode
  • The λ-calculus, 2: The Church-Rosser theorem. ~ Lawrence Paulson. #LambdaCalculus

item.title: Lecturas compartidas el 18 de julio de 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
Las lecturas compartidas en Mastodon el 18 de julio de 2024 son

  • Lecturas compartidas el 16 de julio de 2024. #ITP #Lean4 #Coq #LLMs #Programming #Emacs
  • Functional Pearl: Short and mechanized logical relation for dependent type theories. ~ Yiyun Liu, Stephanie Weirich. #ITP #Coq
  • HHLPar: Automated theorem prover for parallel hybrid communicating sequential processes. ~ Xiangyu Jin, Bohua Zhan, Shuling Wang, Naijun Zhan. #ITP #IsabelleHOL
  • Molly: A verified compiler for cryptographic roles. ~ Daniel J. Dougherty, Joshua D. Guttman. #ITP #Coq
  • Formalizing operads for a categorical framework of DSL composition. ~ Zachary Flores, Angelo Taranto, Yakir Forman, Eric Bond. #ITP #Coq
  • Modular implementation and formalization of dynamic policies (Work in progress). ~ Antonio Zegarelli, Niki Vazou, Marco Guarnieri. #FunctionalProgramming #LiquidHaskell
  • Demystifying Artificial Intelligence (Symbolic, data-driven, statistical and ethical AI). ~ Emmanuel Gillain (ed.). #eBook #AI
  • Using ChatGPT as a proof assistant in a mathematics pathways course. ~ Hyejin Park, Eric D. Manley. #ChatGPT #Math #Reasoning
  • The Haskell Unfolder Episode 29: Exceptions, annotations and backtraces. ~ Edsko de Vries, Andres Löh. #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming

item.title: Lecturas compartidas el 14 de mayo de 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
Las lecturas compartidas en Mastodon el 14 de mayo de 2024 son

  • #Calculemus: Demostraciones con Lean4 e Isabelle/HOL de "Si G es un grupo y a, b ∈ G, entonces (ab)⁻¹ = b⁻¹a⁻¹". #ITP #Lean4 #IsabelleHOL #Math
  • #Exercitium: Matrices de Toepliz. #Haskell #Python #Matemáticas
  • Schönhage-Strassen multiplication (in Isabelle/HOL). ~ Jakob Schulz. #ITP #IsabelleHOL #Math
  • An entry into the world of Org Mode for non Emacs users. ~ James Stoup. #Emacs #OrgMode
  • Writing Lisp code with ChatGPT. #Elisp #ChatGPT
